meanings.definition: A type of pheasant with brightly colored plumage.
meanings.sent1: The zoo had a pair of tragopans in a special aviary.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of tragopans foraging for food in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The tragopans decided to have a fashion show to show off their colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was as vibrant as the plumage of tragopans.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in hues reminiscent of tragopans' feathers.

meanings.sent1: The wildlife photographer captured a flock of tragopans on camera.
meanings.sent2: We spotted several tragopans perched on the tree branches.
meanings.sent3: The children were amazed by the number of tragopans in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of colors, like a gathering of tragopans.
meanings.sent5: The garden bloomed with flowers as vibrant as a group of tragopans.
